io.scanbot.sdk.camera.autosnapping

Interface IAutoSnappingController<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseAutoSnappingController, BaseContourAutoSnappingController, DocumentAutoSnappingController, IdCardAutoSnappingController, WorkflowAutoSnappingController

    public IAutoSnappingController<T>

    Defines interface for component that performs current conditions evaluation and decides the best moment to take snap automatically.

    • Method Detail

      • trySnap

        void trySnap(@NotNull
             T parameter)

        Start conditions evaluation and, maybe, take a snap, e.g. depending on current image status, snap interval etc.
